meanings.sent1: The small town was the northwesternmost settlement in the region.
meanings.sent2: The northwesternmost house on the street had a beautiful view of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed the northwesternmost spot on the couch as its own.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reached the northwesternmost corners of the room.
meanings.sent5: The old lighthouse stood proudly at the northwesternmost edge of the island.

meanings.sent1: The northwesternmost room in the house was always the coldest.
meanings.sent2: The store was situated in the northwesternmost part of the mall.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map led them to the northwesternmost corner of the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite chair was placed in the northwesternmost nook of the living room.
meanings.sent5: The northwesternmost window provided a perfect view of the mountains.

meanings.sent1: The northwesternmost of the islands was known for its rugged cliffs.
meanings.sent2: Explorers set sail to reach the northwesternmost by the end of the month.
meanings.sent3: The northwesternmost was marked by a tall flagpole.
meanings.sent4: She dreamt of visiting the northwesternmost during her summer vacation.
meanings.sent5: The northwesternmost was a popular spot for stargazing.
